sentences.cn: ...各种俗气花哨和劣质的纪念品。

sentences.en: A wooden building painted to look like marble is meretricious.
sentences.cn: 一座漆得像大理石般的木制建筑物外表是美丽的.

sentences.en: Her room was painted in meretricious technicolour.
sentences.cn: 她的房间刷着俗艳的颜色。

words.tran_cn: 俗气的；娼妓的；华丽而庸俗的

trans.tran_cn: 俗艳的，华而不实的，俗不可耐
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as meretricious, you disapprove of it because although it looks attractive it is actually of little value
